creator: Tamra Capital
descriptionHtml:
Embark on your investment journey with Tamra Capital, your trusted digital wealth manager to achieve your financial goals and manage your investments seamlessly. Our firm belief in a world where financial growth is accessible to all leads us to work with passion to launch innovative products and services under the mantra “Until Everyone is Invested.”

We provide financial advisory and investment management services through our application that is built on the robo-advisory technology. Through our application, we provide smart solutions to facilitate the investment process to help you achieve meaningful financial returns for low investment management fees, with the support of our experienced team, advanced technologies, and updated investment strategies.

We believe in Tamra Capital that passive investment strategy is capable of achieving meaningful returns in the long term. That’s why we help individuals invest in an easy and automated way in diversified and balanced portfolios consisting of ETFs that cover stocks, sukuks, real estate, and gold in local and global markets, which makes investing with us safe, religious, and easy for everyone.

Key Features:
• Innovative service: Our platform allows you to access investment services in a new and innovative way to help you achieve your investment goals in a fully automated manner
• Quick registration: We simplify your investment journey through our application with a quick registration process that only takes minutes. All you have to do is enter your ID number and answer a few questions, and we will suggest the investment portfolio that is suitable for your goals and risk tolerance.
• Easy interface: Manage your account and monitor the performance of all of your portfolios with ease and transparency in one place
• Balanced and diversified portfolio: Take advantage of the power of diversification by investing in a diversified and balanced portfolio of ETFs covering stocks, sukuks, real estate and gold in more than 1,000 companies in the local and global markets, to help you achieve high returns while minimizing risks
• Experienced Team: Our team has deep financial expertise to help you take the first step towards achieving your financial and investment goals easily
• Achieving your multiple goals: You can create the appropriate portfolio for each of your different investment goals
• Multiple deposit options: Start your investment journey by depositing into your portfolio’s wallet in a way that suits you, with the different payment channels available in our application
• Unlimited support: We help you by providing advice and answering all of your inquiries before and after starting your investment journey through a dedicated customer success team consisting of consultants who are ready to communicate with you through various communication channels
• Generation Z account: We have introduced the Generation Z account to support young individuals in taking the first step to start their investment journey, with reduced monthly fees
• Secure service: We are a company officially licensed by the Capital Market Authority to provide advisory and investment management services, with license No. 20212-30
• Sharia-compliant solution: All our services and products are complaint with the provisions of Islamic laws, with the approval of the Shariyah Review Bureau. We purify your investments and perform accurate operations to correctly calculate the zakat of your investments

Stay Connected:
Visit our website and follow us on social media to stay informed about the latest financial and investment news and advice:

Website: https://tamracapital.sa
Twitter: https://twitter.com/tamracapital
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/tamracapital/
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/tamracapital

For support or inquiries, please feel free to contact us at info@tamracapital.sa or call our customer success team at 920028255

Until Everyone is Invested!
descriptionShort: Embark on your investment journey with Tamra Capital

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
At Tamra Capital, we are committed to delivering the best-in-class app experience to empower your investment journey. We will be rolling out new updates every few weeks to make managing your investments even more seamless and secure. In this latest update, we have introduced some exciting features and enhancements. These include:
• Money transfer between wallets feature
• Bug fixes and improvements to ensure a smooth and glitch-free experience

descriptionShort: Embark on your investment journey with Tamra Capital

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
In this update, we have introduced some exciting features and enhancements. These include:
• The new Retirement Calculator to help you determine your desired age and financial goal for retirement
• The new Investment Calculator to help you build an investment plan by determining the amount to be invested monthly to reach your goal
• Improvements in displaying the portfolio performance graph
• Improvements in the Statements feature
• Bug fixes and improvements to ensure a smooth experience

title: Tamra | تمرة

creator: Tamra Capital
descriptionHtml:
Tamra Capital is an investment platform that facilitates your investment journey and helps you manage your investments through our robo-advisor technology. At Tamra Capital, we provide smart solutions that help you invest conveniently in diversified and balanced portfolios of exchange-traded funds, enabling you to achieve lucrative financial returns for low fees. We make investment an option available to everyone!
At Tamra Capital, we seek, through our own human capital, our advanced technologies, and our renewed investment strategy, to educate individuals and help them invest in a safe, Shariah-compliant, and easy way.

Why invest with Tamra Capital?

• Innovative Services: Our fully automated platform allows you to access investment services in a new and innovative way that helps you achieve your investment goals and build your wealth.
• Quick registration: We simplify your investment journey, allowing you to register in just a few minutes. Just enter your ID number and answer a few questions, and an investment portfolio aligned with your goals and risk tolerance will be suggested.
• User-friendly interface: Using a single platform, control your account and follow the performance of all your portfolios with ease and transparency.
• Diversified & balanced portfolios: Invest in a diversified & balanced portfolio of exchange-traded funds consisting of real estate, gold, and stocks and bonds in more than 1,000 companies in local and global markets, helping you achieve meaningful returns and reducing risks.
• Meaningful returns: Invest in diversified portfolios whose average annual returns over the long term range from 4% to 12% depending on the type of portfolio you choose.
• Experienced team: Our team has deep financial experience and is well-versed with helping you take the first step towards achieving your financial and investment goals safely.
• Achieving all your goals: With Tamra Financial, you can create different portfolios to suit
• Multiple deposit options: Through the different payment channels available, deposit funds in your wallet in a way that suits you best.
• Unlimited support: Our team of advisors helps you in your investment journey by providing advice and answering all your inquiries through various communication channels.
• Generation Z Account: Because investing is for everyone, we have introduced the Generation Z Account to support young people with taking their first step towards starting their investment journey, with low monthly fees.
• Safe & secure investments: Tamra Capital has officially been licensed by the Saudi Capital Market Authority to provide consulting and investment management services. Our license number is 20212-30.
• A Sharia-compliant solution: All of our work and products are compliant with the provisions of Islamic Sharia, approved by the Sharia Review House. We purify your investments and carry out accurate zakat calculations.

Download the Tamra Capital application and start growing your wealth today!

Follow us on social media to stay up-to-date with the latest financial and investment news and advice:

Website: https://tamracapital.sa
Twitter: https://twitter.com/tamracapital
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/tamracapital
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/tamracapital

For assistance and inquiries, please contact us at info@tamracapital.sa, or you can call our customer support team at 920028255.
descriptionShort: Smart solutions & robo-advisor technology made investment an easy option for all

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
In this latest update, we have introduced some exciting features and enhancements. These include:
• The new “Wallet Target” feature that enables you to choose the financial goal for the wallet and accordingly build the detailed investment plan to achieve that goal
• Improvements in the “Your Wallets” page to enable you to archive unused wallets
• The ability to update National ID and Iqama information after renewing it directly from the platform
• Bug fixes and improvements

title:

creator: Tamra Capital
descriptionHtml:
Tamra Capital is an investment platform that facilitates your investment journey and helps you manage your investments through our robo-advisor technology. At Tamra Capital, we provide smart solutions that help you invest conveniently in diversified and balanced portfolios of exchange-traded funds, enabling you to achieve lucrative financial returns for low fees. We make investment an option available to everyone!
At Tamra Capital, we seek, through our own human capital, our advanced technologies, and our renewed investment strategy, to educate individuals and help them invest in a safe, Shariah-compliant, and easy way.

Why invest with Tamra Capital?

• Innovative Services: Our fully automated platform allows you to access investment services in a new and innovative way that helps you achieve your investment goals and build your wealth.
• Quick registration: We simplify your investment journey, allowing you to register in just a few minutes. Just enter your ID number and answer a few questions, and an investment portfolio aligned with your goals and risk tolerance will be suggested.
• User-friendly interface: Using a single platform, control your account and follow the performance of all your portfolios with ease and transparency.
• Diversified & balanced portfolios: Invest in a diversified & balanced portfolio of exchange-traded funds consisting of real estate, gold, and stocks and bonds in more than 1,000 companies in local and global markets, helping you achieve meaningful returns and reducing risks.
• Meaningful returns: Invest in diversified portfolios whose average annual returns over the long term range from 4% to 12% depending on the type of portfolio you choose.
• Experienced team: Our team has deep financial experience and is well-versed with helping you take the first step towards achieving your financial and investment goals safely.
• Achieving all your goals: With Tamra Financial, you can create different portfolios to suit
• Multiple deposit options: Through the different payment channels available, deposit funds in your wallet in a way that suits you best.
• Unlimited support: Our team of advisors helps you in your investment journey by providing advice and answering all your inquiries through various communication channels.
• Generation Z Account: Because investing is for everyone, we have introduced the Generation Z Account to support young people with taking their first step towards starting their investment journey, with low monthly fees.
• Safe & secure investments: Tamra Capital has officially been licensed by the Saudi Capital Market Authority to provide consulting and investment management services. Our license number is 20212-30.
• A Sharia-compliant solution: All of our work and products are compliant with the provisions of Islamic Sharia, approved by the Sharia Review House. We purify your investments and carry out accurate zakat calculations.

Download the Tamra Capital application and start growing your wealth today!

Follow us on social media to stay up-to-date with the latest financial and investment news and advice:

Website: https://tamracapital.sa
Twitter: https://twitter.com/tamracapital
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/tamracapital
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/tamracapital

For assistance and inquiries, please contact us at info@tamracapital.sa, or you can call our customer support team at 920028255.
